briefTitle: Telmisartan and Amlodipine Fixed Dose Combination [FDC] Trial for the Treatment of Severe Hypertension

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion criteria

1. Ability to provide written informed consent in accordance with Good Clinical Practice and local legislation
2. Age 18 years or older
3. Patients with severe hypertension as defined SBP greater than 180 mmHg and DBP greater than 95 mmHg at randomisation
4. Ability to stop any current antihypertensive therapy without unacceptable risk to the patient (Investigators discretion)

Exclusion criteria Mean in-clinic seated cuff SBP \>/= 200 mmHg and/or Diastolic Blood Pressure \[DBP\] \>/= 95 mmHg

outcomeMeasures.description: Overall mean reduction from a common mean baseline in SBP

outcomeMeasures.title: Patients Achieving Diastolic Blood Pressure Control at Week 1
outcomeMeasures.description: Diastolic Blood Pressure Control is defined as achieving DBP \< 90mmHg

outcomeMeasures.title: Patients Achieving Diastolic Blood Pressure Control at Week 2
outcomeMeasures.description: DBP \< 90 mmHg

outcomeMeasures.title: Patients Achieving Blood Pressure Control at Week 1
outcomeMeasures.description: Blood Pressure Control is defined as achieving SBP\< 140 mmHg and DBP \< 90mmHg

outcomeMeasures.title: Patients Achieving Blood Pressure Control at Week 2
outcomeMeasures.description: SBP \< 140 mmHg and DBP \< 90 mmHg

outcomeMeasures.title: Patients Achieving Diastolic Blood Pressure Response at Week 1
outcomeMeasures.description: Diastolic Blood Pressure Response is defined as achieving DBP \< 90 mmHg or a reduction of \>= 10 mmHg

outcomeMeasures.title: Patients Achieving Diastolic Blood Pressure Response at Week 2
outcomeMeasures.description: DBP \< 90 mmHg or reduction of \>= 10 mmHg

outcomeMeasures.title: Patients Achieving Systolic Blood Pressure Response at Week 1

outcomeMeasures.description: SBP \< 140 mmHg or reduction of \>= 15 mmHg

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients Achieving Various Blood Pressure Response Levels at Week 1
